subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Roger Federer lost to Jürgen Melzer, 6-4, 6-4, in swirling wind in the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals Friday, his earliest tournament exit since Wimbledon last year.
snippet: Roger Federer lost to Jürgen Melzer, 6-4, 6-4, in swirling wind in the Monte Carlo Masters quarterfinals Friday, his earliest tournament exit since Wimbledon last year.
